chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
    On the feast day of Saint Boniface <break time="500ms"/> we celebrate the joys of this day. Saint Boniface, <break time="500ms"/> may they save us by the Lord's grace through your merits.
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
In Natale sancti Bonifacii archiepiscopi. Gaudia praesentis, Bonifaci sancte, diei
Nos salvent, Domino dante tuis meritis.
